channel.title: NPCHandler Help
channel.description:
I Recently Downloaded Fr33sc4p3 Server Source I Also Made A Server (Scrotumscape) using that source and people have been playing it no problem and having fun.
But The Thing is As It is a Pre-Made Source the NPC's say what the creater made them say.
I have successfull changed what they say and saved it, BUT when i got bac onto my server it still appears to show the originally phrases.
I was told to compile my server but when i do that it says that i do not have JDK 5.0 or 6.0
But i am sure I do because i had to download it in order for people to be able to play my server in the first place
I have Jdk 6u1 - but isn't that the same as JDK 6.0 anyway
Somebody either send me the link to the software (Java or whatever) that i need or tell me what i need to do instead in order to make it work
Send me a direct link or instructions
i would so gratefull
THANKS EVERY1 X

item.title: NPCHandler Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

when you do that, go into NPCHandler and fress CTRL+F and type in Thug Life

Then it comes up in the first thug life you ind, type your username and just underthat it says Thug Life is Online!
and Thug Life is Offline!

just change them to make them say what you want, save it
then compile…

Read full topic

item.description:
@zamathiar wrote:

get jdk 6 from this link https://sdlc5b.sun.com/ECom/EComActionServlet;jsessionid=AB986B0EF1C2A9F0E82A2E2952C593FB
it works
yw’
–Zamathiar

Read full topic

item.title: NPCHandler Help
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

It may of

Not compiled your work successfully.
There could be two strings that tell them to say that.

You could

Get a new compiler.
Keep searching through every file for what they say, and change them.

Read full topic

item.title: NPCHandler Help

item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

have Jdk 6u1 - but isn't that the same as JDK 6.0 anyway

Thats the problem try just getting 6 or lower but only to 5
OR try getting a new compiler should be in tutorial list for perfect compiler 1.8

JAVA JDK:
https://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49747.0.html
